programme.title: Sherlock Holmes (1954)
programme.sub-title: The Case of the Pennsylvania Gun
programme.desc: Holmes and Watson investigate the murder of Squire Douglas, who was shot in a sealed-up castle.

programme.title: The Adventures of Sherlock Holmes
programme.sub-title: The Speckled Band
programme.desc: A woman asks Holmes for help after her stepfather moves her into her late sister's room.

programme.title: The Adventures of Sherlock Holmes
programme.sub-title: The Blue Carbuncle
programme.desc: Holmes investigates when a famous gem known as the Blue Carbuncle is stolen.

programme.title: The Adventures of Sherlock Holmes
programme.sub-title: The Copper Beeches
programme.desc: A woman gets a job offer that requires her to cut her chestnut hair and sit by a window.

programme.title: The Return of Sherlock Holmes
programme.sub-title: The Devil's Foot
programme.desc: Holmes is forced to take a recuperative break but a local murder alleviates his boredom.

programme.title: The Return of Sherlock Holmes
programme.sub-title: Silver Blaze
programme.desc: Holmes investigates when a prize race horse disappears and its trainer dies unnaturally.

programme.title: The Return of Sherlock Holmes
programme.sub-title: Wisteria Lodge
programme.desc: An amateur cartographer visiting another map enthusiast seeks help when his host vanishes overnight.

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes (1954)
programme.sub-title: The Case of the Jolly Hangman

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes (1954)
programme.sub-title: The Case of the Eiffel Tower
programme.desc: A puzzling note causes Holmes, Watson and Lestrade to journey to Paris.

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes (1954)
programme.sub-title: The Case of the Exhumed Client
programme.desc: Sherlock investigates Sir Charles Farnsworth's death in his mysterious Farnsworth Castle.

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes (1954)
programme.sub-title: The Case of the Impromptu Performance
programme.desc: A condemned man scheduled to hang in a day requests Sherlock Holmes to prove his innocence.

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes (1954)
programme.sub-title: The Case of the Baker Street Bachelors
programme.desc: To find the blackmailers of a political leader, Holmes and Watson join a lonely hearts club.

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes (1954)
programme.sub-title: The Case of the Royal Murderer

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes (1954)
programme.sub-title: The Case of the Neurotic Detective
programme.desc: Watson believes Holmes is a criminal mastermind, but all is not as it seems.

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes (1954)
programme.sub-title: The Case of the Unlucky Gambler
programme.desc: A young boy asks for Holmes' help in finding his missing father.

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes (1954)
programme.sub-title: The Case of the Diamond Tooth
programme.desc: While walking along the banks of the River Thames, Watson finds a diamond tooth.

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes (1954)
programme.sub-title: The Case of the Tyrant's Daughter
programme.desc: Man offers money to his stepdaughter's fiance to disappear.

programme.title: The Adventures of Sherlock Holmes

programme.sub-title: The Norwood Builder
programme.desc: Holmes investigates a death in a fire and suspects the beneficiary of the victim's will.

programme.title: The Adventures of Sherlock Holmes
programme.sub-title: The Resident Patient
programme.desc: A young doctor asks Holmes to investigate the strange behavior of his benefactor.

programme.sub-title: The Illustrious Client

programme.sub-title: The Creeping Man

programme.sub-title: The Case of the Winthrop Legend
programme.desc: Legendary silver coins presage death.

programme.sub-title: The Case of the Split Ticket

programme.sub-title: The Case of the Careless Suffragette

programme.sub-title: The Case of the Imposter Mystery

programme.title: The Memoirs of Sherlock Holmes
programme.sub-title: The Red Circle
programme.desc: A nervous landlady brings a mysterious boarder to Holmes' attention, leading to a secret society.

programme.title: The Memoirs of Sherlock Holmes
programme.sub-title: The Mazarin Stone

programme.sub-title: The Cardboard Box
